poem:
Title: "The Expedient Hand of Aid"

In restless dreams of world's recalibration,
Biden's pen whispers a resounding song.
Ninety-five billion, dove's apology 
to the roaring bear, to far flung states.
A noble guise of peace in folded paper,
for Ukraine's winter, Israel's guardian wave, Taiwan's dawn.
A day hailed 'good' for global whispering peace, 
Yet I ask - when will the thunder cease?
